Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.sensors

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ColorController  
    LightColorPoller
    Polls light sensor data for rgb colors
    LightController  
    LightPoller  
    UltrasonicPoller
    The while loop at the bottom executes in a loop.
    USController
    Separating the controllers for the different sensors Instead of implementing the different classes (USLocalizer and later on object avoidance) to be controllers, we have one controller that filters bad values as this does not change, and so that we do not have to initialize the poller twice Class is used to define how to handle the data and to save the data
